comments.raw_text:
Build Id:
Mozilla/5.0 (Android; Linux armv71; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110307 Firefox/4.0b13pre Fennec/4.0b6pre

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to reader.google.com
2. Re-orient to landscape
3. Tap on the "username" field
4. Press "Go".

Actual Results:
The page starts to load the login information and the landscape keyboard does not dismiss

Expected Results:
The "Next" button is shown instead of the "Go" button and the landscape keyboard should dismiss.
comments.creator: mozaakash@gmail.com
comments.text:
Build Id:
Mozilla/5.0 (Android; Linux armv71; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110307 Firefox/4.0b13pre Fennec/4.0b6pre

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to reader.google.com
2. Re-orient to landscape
3. Tap on the "username" field
4. Press "Go".

Actual Results:
The page starts to load the login information and the landscape keyboard does not dismiss

Expected Results:
The "Next" button is shown instead of the "Go" button and the landscape keyboard should dismiss.
comments.author: mozaakash@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
I think the "go" button is expected - we show "next" only in forms without default submit actions (see bug 614356 comment 3).

Not dismissing does sound like a bug.
comments.creator: mbrubeck@limpet.net
comments.author: mbrubeck@limpet.net
comments.text:

comments.raw_text:
Moving to p3 because no activity for at least 1 year(s).
See https://github.com/mozilla/bug-handling/blob/master/policy/triage-bugzilla.md#how-do-you-triage for more information
